custom-sql.sql:
DECLARE @CFP TABLE ( CFP_CONTRACT_SID INT )
INSERT INTO @CFP (CFP_CONTRACT_SID)
SELECT Distinct CFP_CD.CFP_CONTRACT_SID FROM CFP_CONTRACT_DETAILS CFP_CD JOIN COMPANY_MASTER CFP_CM ON CFP_CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID=CFP_CD.COMPANY_MASTER_SID AND CFP_CM.COMPANY_NO like '?CMP_NO?' AND CFP_CD.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND CFP_CM.COMPANY_NAME like '?CMP_NAME?'
DECLARE @IFP TABLE ( IFP_CONTRACT_SID INT )
INSERT INTO @IFP (IFP_CONTRACT_SID)
SELECT Distinct IFP_CD.IFP_CONTRACT_SID FROM IFP_CONTRACT_DETAILS IFP_CD JOIN ITEM_MASTER IFP_IM ON IFP_IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID=IFP_CD.ITEM_MASTER_SID AND IFP_IM.ITEM_NO like '?IM_NO?' AND IFP_IM.ITEM_NAME like '?IM_NAME?' AND IFP_CD.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D'
SELECT distinct CH_CM.COMPANY_NO CONTRACT_HOLDER, CTM.CONTRACT_NO, CTM.CONTRACT_NAME, MT.DESCRIPTION MARKET_TYPE, CTM.START_DATE, CTM.END_DATE, CFP_CTM.CFP_NAME, IFP_CT.IFP_NAME, PS_CT.PS_NAME, RS_CT.RS_NAME, CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, CFP_CTM.CFP_CONTRACT_SID, IFP_CT.IFP_CONTRACT_SID, PS_CT.PS_CONTRACT_SID, RS_CT.RS_CONTRACT_SID FROM CONTRACT_MASTER CTM JOIN HELPER_TABLE MT ON CTM.CONTRACT_TYPE=MT.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND CTM.RECORD_LOCK_STATUS=0 AND CTM.CONTRACT_NO like '?CT_NO?' AND CTM.CONTRACT_NAME like '?CT_NAME?' AND CTM.CONTRACT_TYPE like '?MT?' ?DATE? LEFT JOIN COMPANY_MASTER CH_CM ON CH_CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CTM.CONT_HOLD_COMPANY_MASTER_SID AND CH_CM.COMPANY_NO like '?CT_HOLD?' LEFT OUTER JOIN CONTRACT_ALIAS_MASTER CAM ON CAM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID AND CAM.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND CAM.CONTRACT_ALIAS_NO like '?AL_NO?' AND CAM.CONTRACT_ALIAS_TYPE like '?AL_TYPE?' JOIN CFP_CONTRACT CFP_CTM ON CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=CFP_CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID AND CTM.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND CFP_CTM.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND CFP_CTM.CFP_NAME like '?CFP_NAME?' JOIN IFP_CONTRACT IFP_CT ON CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=IFP_CT.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID AND IFP_CT.CFP_CONTRACT_SID= CFP_CTM.CFP_CONTRACT_SID AND IFP_CT.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND IFP_CT.IFP_NAME like '?IFP_NAME?' JOIN PS_CONTRACT PS_CT ON CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=PS_CT.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID AND PS_CT.IFP_CONTRACT_SID=IFP_CT.IFP_CONTRACT_SID AND PS_CT.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND PS_CT.PS_NAME LIKE '?PS_NAME?' JOIN RS_CONTRACT RS_CT ON CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=RS_CT.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID AND RS_CT.PS_CONTRACT_SID=PS_CT.PS_CONTRACT_SID AND RS_CT.RS_NAME LIKE '?RS_NAME?' JOIN @CFP CFP ON CFP.CFP_CONTRACT_SID=CFP_CTM.CFP_CONTRACT_SID JOIN @IFP IFP ON IFP.IFP_CONTRACT_SID=IFP_CT.IFP_CONTRACT_SID WHERE CTM.RECORD_LOCK_STATUS=0 ?CH_WHERE? ORDER BY CH_CM.COMPANY_NO, CTM.CONTRACT_NO, CTM.CONTRACT_NAME, MT.DESCRIPTION, CTM.START_DATE, CTM.END_DATE, CFP_CTM.CFP_NAME, IFP_CT.IFP_NAME, PS_CT.PS_NAME, RS_CT.RS_NAME;

DECLARE @CFP TABLE ( CFP_CONTRACT_SID INT )
INSERT INTO @CFP (CFP_CONTRACT_SID)
SELECT Distinct CFP_CD.CFP_CONTRACT_SID FROM CFP_CONTRACT_DETAILS CFP_CD JOIN COMPANY_MASTER CFP_CM ON CFP_CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID=CFP_CD.COMPANY_MASTER_SID AND CFP_CM.COMPANY_NO like '?CMP_NO?' AND CFP_CD.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND CFP_CM.COMPANY_NAME like '?CMP_NAME?'
DECLARE @IFP TABLE ( IFP_CONTRACT_SID INT )
INSERT INTO @IFP (IFP_CONTRACT_SID)
SELECT Distinct IFP_CD.IFP_CONTRACT_SID FROM IFP_CONTRACT_DETAILS IFP_CD JOIN ITEM_MASTER IFP_IM ON IFP_IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID=IFP_CD.ITEM_MASTER_SID AND IFP_IM.ITEM_NO like '?IM_NO?' AND IFP_IM.ITEM_NAME like '?IM_NAME?' AND IFP_CD.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D'
SELECT distinct CH_CM.COMPANY_NO CONTRACT_HOLDER, CTM.CONTRACT_NO, CTM.CONTRACT_NAME, MT.DESCRIPTION MARKET_TYPE, CTM.START_DATE, CTM.END_DATE, CFP_CTM.CFP_NAME, IFP_CT.IFP_NAME, PS_CT.PS_NAME, RS_CT.RS_NAME, CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, CFP_CTM.CFP_CONTRACT_SID, IFP_CT.IFP_CONTRACT_SID, PS_CT.PS_CONTRACT_SID, RS_CT.RS_CONTRACT_SID FROM CONTRACT_MASTER CTM JOIN HELPER_TABLE MT ON CTM.CONTRACT_TYPE=MT.HELPER_TABLE_SID AND CTM.RECORD_LOCK_STATUS=0 AND CTM.CONTRACT_NO like '?CT_NO?' AND CTM.CONTRACT_NAME like '?CT_NAME?' AND CTM.CONTRACT_TYPE like '?MT?' ?DATE? LEFT JOIN COMPANY_MASTER CH_CM ON CH_CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CTM.CONT_HOLD_COMPANY_MASTER_SID AND CH_CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID like '?CT_HOLD?' LEFT OUTER JOIN CONTRACT_ALIAS_MASTER CAM ON CAM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID AND CAM.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND CAM.CONTRACT_ALIAS_NO like '?AL_NO?' AND CAM.CONTRACT_ALIAS_TYPE like '?AL_TYPE?' JOIN CFP_CONTRACT CFP_CTM ON CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=CFP_CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID AND CTM.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND CFP_CTM.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND CFP_CTM.CFP_NAME like '?CFP_NAME?' JOIN IFP_CONTRACT IFP_CT ON CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=IFP_CT.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID AND IFP_CT.CFP_CONTRACT_SID= CFP_CTM.CFP_CONTRACT_SID AND IFP_CT.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND IFP_CT.IFP_NAME like '?IFP_NAME?' JOIN PS_CONTRACT PS_CT ON CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=PS_CT.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID AND PS_CT.IFP_CONTRACT_SID=IFP_CT.IFP_CONTRACT_SID AND PS_CT.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND PS_CT.PS_NAME LIKE '?PS_NAME?' JOIN RS_CONTRACT RS_CT ON CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=RS_CT.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID AND RS_CT.PS_CONTRACT_SID=PS_CT.PS_CONTRACT_SID AND RS_CT.RS_NAME LIKE '?RS_NAME?' JOIN @CFP CFP ON CFP.CFP_CONTRACT_SID=CFP_CTM.CFP_CONTRACT_SID JOIN @IFP IFP ON IFP.IFP_CONTRACT_SID=IFP_CT.IFP_CONTRACT_SID WHERE CTM.RECORD_LOCK_STATUS=0 ?CH_WHERE? ORDER BY CH_CM.COMPANY_NO, CTM.CONTRACT_NO, CTM.CONTRACT_NAME, MT.DESCRIPTION, CTM.START_DATE, CTM.END_DATE, CFP_CTM.CFP_NAME, IFP_CT.IFP_NAME, PS_CT.PS_NAME, RS_CT.RS_NAME;
SELECT CONTRACT_ID, CONTRACT_NO, CONTRACT_NAME, CONTRACT_MASTER_SID FROM CONTRACT_MASTER WHERE CONTRACT_MASTER_SID in(?SIDS?);

SELECT CM.CFP_ID, CM.CFP_NO, CM.CFP_NAME, CC.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, CC.CFP_CONTRACT_SID FROM CFP_CONTRACT CC JOIN CFP_MODEL CM ON CM.CFP_MODEL_SID=CC.CFP_MODEL_SID AND CC.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=?CMSID? AND CC.CFP_CONTRACT_SID in(?SIDS?);

SELECT IM.IFP_ID, IM.IFP_NO, IM.IFP_NAME, IT.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, IT.CFP_CONTRACT_SID, IT.IFP_CONTRACT_SID FROM IFP_CONTRACT IT JOIN IFP_MODEL IM ON IM.IFP_MODEL_SID=IT.IFP_MODEL_SID AND IT.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=?CMSID? AND IT.IFP_CONTRACT_SID in(?SIDS?);

SELECT PM.PS_ID, PM.PS_NO, PM.PS_NAME, PC.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, PC.CFP_CONTRACT_SID, PC.IFP_CONTRACT_SID, PC.PS_CONTRACT_SID FROM PS_CONTRACT PC JOIN PS_MODEL PM ON PC.PS_MODEL_SID=PM.PS_MODEL_SID AND PC.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=?CMSID? AND PC.PS_CONTRACT_SID in(?SIDS?);

SELECT RM.RS_ID, RM.RS_NO, RM.RS_NAME, RC.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, RC.CFP_CONTRACT_SID, RC.IFP_CONTRACT_SID, RC.PS_CONTRACT_SID, RC.RS_CONTRACT_SID FROM RS_CONTRACT RC JOIN RS_MODEL RM ON RC.RS_MODEL_SID=RM.RS_MODEL_SID AND RC.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=?CMSID? AND RC.RS_CONTRACT_SID in(?SIDS?);

SELECT Distinct CFP_CM.COMPANY_NO, CFP_CM.COMPANY_NAME, CFP_CD.COMPANY_START_DATE, CFP_CD.COMPANY_END_DATE, ST.DESCRIPTION, CFP_CD.TRADE_CLASS, CFP_CD.CFP_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_DATE FROM CFP_CONTRACT_DETAILS CFP_CD JOIN COMPANY_MASTER CFP_CM ON CFP_CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID=CFP_CD.COMPANY_MASTER_SID AND CFP_CD.CFP_CONTRACT_SID=?SID? AND CFP_CD.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON CFP_CD.CFP_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_STATUS=ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID;

SELECT IFP_IM.ITEM_NO, IFP_IM.ITEM_NAME, BND.BRAND_NAME, ST.DESCRIPTION, IFP_CD.ITEM_START_DATE, IFP_CD.ITEM_END_DATE, IFP_CD.IFP_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_DATE FROM IFP_CONTRACT_DETAILS IFP_CD JOIN ITEM_MASTER IFP_IM ON IFP_IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID=IFP_CD.ITEM_MASTER_SID AND IFP_CD.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND IFP_CD.IFP_CONTRACT_SID=?SID? JOIN BRAND_MASTER BND ON IFP_IM.BRAND_MASTER_SID=BND.BRAND_MASTER_SID LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID=IFP_CD.IFP_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_STATUS;

SELECT PS_IM.ITEM_NO, PS_IM.ITEM_NAME, BND.BRAND_NAME, ST.DESCRIPTION, PS_CD.CONTRACT_PRICE_START_DATE, PS_CD.CONTRACT_PRICE_END_DATE, PT.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_NAME, PS_CD.PRICE_PROTECTION_START_DATE, PS_CD.PRICE_PROTECTION_END_DATE, TYP.DESCRIPTION, PS_CD.PRICE_TOLERANCE_INTERVAL, FREQ.DESCRIPTION, PS_CD.PS_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_DATE FROM PS_CONTRACT_DETAILS PS_CD JOIN ITEM_MASTER PS_IM ON PS_IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID=PS_CD.ITEM_MASTER_SID AND PS_CD.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND PS_CD.PS_CONTRACT_SID=?SID? LEFT JOIN BRAND_MASTER BND ON PS_IM.BRAND_MASTER_SID=BND.BRAND_MASTER_SID LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID=PS_CD.PS_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_STATUS LEFT JOIN ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER PT ON PS_CD.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID=PT.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE FREQ ON FREQ.HELPER_TABLE_SID=PS_CD.PRICE_TOLERANCE_FREQUENCY LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE TYP ON TYP.HELPER_TABLE_SID=PS_CD.PRICE_TOLERANCE_TYPE;

SELECT RS_IM.ITEM_NO, RS_IM.ITEM_NAME, BND.BRAND_NAME, ST.DESCRIPTION, RS_CD.ITEM_REBATE_START_DATE, RS_CD.ITEM_REBATE_END_DATE, RPM.REBATE_PLAN_ID, RPM.REBATE_PLAN_NO, RS_CD.REBATE_AMOUNT, RS_CD.BUNDLE_NO, RS_CD.RS_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_DATE FROM RS_CONTRACT_DETAILS RS_CD JOIN ITEM_MASTER RS_IM ON RS_IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID=RS_CD.ITEM_MASTER_SID AND RS_CD.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND RS_CD.RS_CONTRACT_SID=?SID? JOIN BRAND_MASTER BND ON RS_IM.BRAND_MASTER_SID=BND.BRAND_MASTER_SID LEFT JOIN HELPER_TABLE ST ON ST.HELPER_TABLE_SID=RS_CD.RS_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_STATUS LEFT JOIN REBATE_PLAN_MASTER RPM ON RPM.REBATE_PLAN_MASTER_SID=RS_CD.REBATE_PLAN_MASTER_SID;
CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, CTM.CONTRACT_ID, CTM.CONTRACT_NO, CTM.CONTRACT_NAME
CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, CFP_CTM.CFP_CONTRACT_SID, CFP_M.CFP_ID, CFP_M.CFP_NO, CFP_M.CFP_NAME
CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, CFP_CTM.CFP_CONTRACT_SID, IFP_CT.IFP_CONTRACT_SID, IFP_M.IFP_ID, IFP_M.IFP_NO, IFP_M.IFP_NAME
CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, CFP_CTM.CFP_CONTRACT_SID, IFP_CT.IFP_CONTRACT_SID, PS_CT.PS_CONTRACT_SID, PS_M.PS_ID, PS_M.PS_NO, PS_M.PS_NAME
CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, CFP_CTM.CFP_CONTRACT_SID, IFP_CT.IFP_CONTRACT_SID, PS_CT.PS_CONTRACT_SID, RS_CT.RS_CONTRACT_SID, RS_M.RS_ID, RS_M.RS_NO, RS_M.RS_NAME

SELECT distinct ?SELECTION? FROM CONTRACT_MASTER CTM JOIN CFP_CONTRACT CFP_CTM ON CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=CFP_CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID AND CTM.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND CFP_CTM.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND CTM.RECORD_LOCK_STATUS=1 AND CTM.CONTRACT_NO like '?CT_NO?' AND CTM.CONTRACT_NAME like '?CT_NAME?' AND CTM.CONTRACT_ID like '?CT_ID?' AND CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID like '?CT_SID?' AND CFP_CTM.CFP_CONTRACT_SID like '?CFP_SID?' JOIN CFP_MODEL CFP_M ON CFP_M.CFP_MODEL_SID=CFP_CTM.CFP_MODEL_SID AND CFP_M.CFP_ID like '?CFP_ID?' AND CFP_M.CFP_NO like '?CFP_NO?' AND CFP_M.CFP_NAME like '?CFP_NAME?' JOIN IFP_CONTRACT IFP_CT ON CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=IFP_CT.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID AND IFP_CT.CFP_CONTRACT_SID= CFP_CTM.CFP_CONTRACT_SID AND IFP_CT.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND IFP_CT.IFP_CONTRACT_SID like '?IFP_SID?' JOIN IFP_MODEL IFP_M ON IFP_M.IFP_MODEL_SID=IFP_CT.IFP_MODEL_SID AND IFP_M.IFP_NAME like '?IFP_NAME?' AND IFP_M.IFP_NO like '?IFP_NO?' AND IFP_M.IFP_ID like '?IFP_ID?' JOIN PS_CONTRACT PS_CT ON CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=PS_CT.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID AND PS_CT.IFP_CONTRACT_SID=IFP_CT.IFP_CONTRACT_SID AND PS_CT.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND PS_CT.PS_CONTRACT_SID like '?PS_SID?' JOIN PS_MODEL PS_M ON PS_M.PS_MODEL_SID=PS_CT.PS_MODEL_SID AND PS_M.PS_NAME like '?PS_NAME?' AND PS_M.PS_NO like '?PS_NO?' AND PS_M.PS_ID like '?PS_ID?' JOIN RS_CONTRACT RS_CT ON CTM.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=RS_CT.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID AND RS_CT.PS_CONTRACT_SID=PS_CT.PS_CONTRACT_SID AND RS_CT.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND RS_CT.RS_CONTRACT_SID like '?RS_SID?' JOIN RS_MODEL RS_M ON RS_M.RS_MODEL_SID=RS_CT.RS_MODEL_SID AND RS_M.RS_NAME like '?RS_NAME?' AND RS_M.RS_NO like '?RS_NO?' AND RS_M.RS_ID like '?RS_ID?';
SELECT Count(DISTINCT HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM RS_CONTRACT RS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HT ON HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS.RS_TYPE AND HT.DESCRIPTION like '?';

SELECT DISTINCT HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HT.DESCRIPTION FROM RS_CONTRACT RS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HT ON HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS.RS_TYPE AND HT.DESCRIPTION like '?' GROUP BY HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HT.DESCRIPTION ORDER BY HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY
SELECT Count(DISTINCT HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM RS_CONTRACT RS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HT ON HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS.RS_CATEGORY AND HT.DESCRIPTION like '?';

SELECT DISTINCT HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HT.DESCRIPTION FROM RS_CONTRACT RS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HT ON HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS.RS_CATEGORY AND HT.DESCRIPTION like '?' GROUP BY HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HT.DESCRIPTION ORDER BY HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY
SELECT Count(DISTINCT HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM RS_CONTRACT RS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HT ON HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS.REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE AND HT.DESCRIPTION like '?';

SELECT DISTINCT HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HT.DESCRIPTION FROM RS_CONTRACT RS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HT ON HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS.REBATE_PROGRAM_TYPE AND HT.DESCRIPTION like '?' GROUP BY HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HT.DESCRIPTION ORDER BY HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY
SELECT Count(DISTINCT HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM RS_CONTRACT RS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HT ON HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS.PAYMENT_FREQUENCY AND HT.DESCRIPTION like '?';

SELECT DISTINCT HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HT.DESCRIPTION FROM RS_CONTRACT RS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HT ON HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS.PAYMENT_FREQUENCY AND HT.DESCRIPTION like '?' GROUP BY HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HT.DESCRIPTION ORDER BY HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY
SELECT Count(DISTINCT HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM RS_CONTRACT RS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HT ON HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS.REBATE_PLAN_LEVEL AND HT.DESCRIPTION like '?';

SELECT DISTINCT HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HT.DESCRIPTION FROM RS_CONTRACT RS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HT ON HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID = RS.REBATE_PLAN_LEVEL AND HT.DESCRIPTION like '?' GROUP BY HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HT.DESCRIPTION ORDER BY HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY
